website_summaries.verdict: An excellent hot tub cover with the thickest foam possible to insulate and maintain heat effectively.
pros: Boasts 28-ounce marine-grade vinyl that resists mildew
Nylon lifting handles make it easy to get on and off
Four locking tie-down straps keep the cover in place
Thick vapor barrier prevents it from getting waterlogged
cons: Some buyers complain about slow shipping times

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.  easy to define the product with their online questionnaire.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. arrived quickly. (They will expedite production for a charge and quote 4-6 weeks otherwise. However, they made mine within 3 days of the order and I had it in a week: probably no reason to pay an expedite fee.) Lesson learned: I gave slightly oversize dimensions and lower radius corners to be sure the cover was big enough and I now have a cover that is slightly oversized with slightly sharper corners than the spa. No big deal. You probably don't have to err on the big side more than perhaps 1/4 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hot tub cover for my parents and they have been so impressed! My Dad loves that it is so lightweight and effortless to flip open. We will be interested to see whether or not it becomes waterlogged in the future as many hot tub covers do but at this point we are very happy with it! Customer service was simple and straightforward and the communication from the company was great! Dimensions of the cover came just as ordered and it fits perfectly. My Dad loves that it is almost a vacuum seal and seems to keep the heat in very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of of bad workmanship and upgrade costs
customer_reviews.text: The VERY FIRST TIME I OPENED THE COVER, THE STRAP BROKE OFF.....EVEN THOUGH I PAID HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS IN UPGRADES!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service and warranty
customer_reviews.text: The company custom makes your cover and stays in contact every step of the way. With a 5 year warranty friendly staff and email updates as they made our cover, we were very pleased. Thank you for high quality service and a warranty to back it up
customer_reviews.author: Larry and Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great company to work with. I ordered this spa cover and the measurements were incorrect. They worked with me and we got the correct dimensions. As far as the cover goes, it is amazing quality. It fits perfectly. I love how lightweight it is. I don't even need a lift for it. I definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and appears to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Took measurements and it fits perfectly. I like the fact that it is taper so that water won't collect on it like my old cover. Appears to be high quality, I will see if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: William Simonis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT JOB GUYS OUTSTANDING COVER
customer_reviews.text: I am So Amazed with this HotTub Cover, it's So well Made and fits so Perfectly, I live at 7400 ft Elevation and Snow can easily exceed 4 ft. This cover with the extra dense Foam will Really hold up.AWESOME PRODUCT. GOOD JOB GUYS.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this lid it's my 2and I bought from this company I sold my old hot tub and the other one went with it this is my new hot tub and the lid that came with it was junk so I bought another one from these guys I love it
customer_reviews.author: nurse

customer_reviews.title: Shipper left a mangled mess
customer_reviews.text: The box the spa cover came in was destroyed. Almost impossible to believe the cover wasnt damaged. It fits good. I have to wait till winter to see if it holds the heat. Like the hot springs cover that came with the spa did
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barber

customer_reviews.title: terrific, one snag
customer_reviews.text: terrific , one snag, you have to buy your own screws for the straps, odd
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it. So far holding up well in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So far holding up well in the heaviest Seattle rain year ever
customer_reviews.author: CALVIN

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Company easy to work with and the cover fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived
customer_reviews.text: Hot tub cover appears top notch and well made. I added the xtra foam and plastic wrap to hopefully extend the life of the cover because once it takes on water, it's ruined.
customer_reviews.author: kingren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover and superior customer service
customer_reviews.text: While I had to pay extra for some things that I think should be standard on a high quality cover (handles on the sides were extra) it does seem like a very good quality cover and is working great so far. Customer service was very nice and they made special efforts to understand my specific needs and crafted the cover to my requirements, so for that they certainly deserve high marks. No problems with delivery damage as some other reviews have posted. I am hoping the quality translates into the kind of life expectancy they indicate.
customer_reviews.author: Netdaemon

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product....
customer_reviews.text: It's been over a year with this cover and I am very pleased. It is holding up well, and is really doing a good job of insulating my hot tub. You won't be disappointed if you order this cover...
customer_reviews.author: Dale G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks nice, but I'm afraid it won't last. There are only 2 handles on ends, none on the sides for helping to flip. (My old covers had 6) Also, the handles are flimsy material, and stretched out on the first use. The outside cover material doesn't seem as substantial as my previous cover. It ripped when the corner rubbed against the screw head of my cover lifter on the first try. Maybe this was my fault, but I didn't expect it to tear so easily. Stitching doesn't seem as well done or substantial as my old cover.
customer_reviews.author: rjk

customer_reviews.title: Very light and a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cover with most of the upgrades customer service was very good they arranged the shipping to arrive at a later date when I could be home to receive the cover the timing worked out great except for the shipping box was very beat up and a few dings in the backside of the cover, the cover is a good fit and looks great the one downside could be the vinyl is half the thickness of the original cover I hope it will withstand the next hail storm that comes through and last another 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Tracker chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Service! Great Cover! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality and workmanship if this spa cover. Perfectly custom made. Communication was very good. They sent messages as they were constructing it and arrived when they said. I would HIGHLY recommend BeyondNice if looking for a new spa cover.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi E.

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Cover and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one about a year ago and I am happy to report it has been a very high quality, sturdy cover. I live in New Hampshire and this top sees a lot of weather. Be sure to get double wrapped and seam stoppers. I got all the extras and this is very thick cover. I paid only 400.00. Delivery was late by a week and they gave 50 more bucks off. Also good idea to spray with waterproofer on outside. It still looks brand new. Be sure to measure correctly..a little big better than too small. Mine fit perfectly and is well made. So happy with this product..good customer service too. Buy it here your search is over.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Smarter

customer_reviews.title: Quality and customer service and updates on progress.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd cover we have purchased over the many years of hot tubbing. Live in the cold north and keep our tub outdoors and use all winter so quality construction is very important. The cover from BeyondNice is by far the best we have ever purchased. Fits perfect and has features that the other did not. Quality made and looking forward to many years of use, in fact it will probably outlast out current hot tub. Ha!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Freiwald

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits perfectly, and we got it within 2-3 weeks of placing the order. It's WAY lighter than the old cover, and even makes a sort of air-lock seal along the spa's edges. Haven't got an electric bill since we replaced the cover, but anticipate on some savings in that area. The local hot tub company sells a cover that costs the same, and has a 1 year warrantee. From Beyond Nice, for the same price we got a thicker cover, and double wrapped to help prevent/delay waterlogging, and a 5 year warrantee. A better deal. Of course it's still brand-new, and no telling how long it will actually hold up.
customer_reviews.author: martha f johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected. Good quality and fit so far. The straps were off a little bit from my measurements, but not a big deal. I got a longer skirt and corners without the splits, and I'm happy with my choices. I'm in Phoenix, so I'm curious how it will do with the temps and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Five G in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Love this company!
customer_reviews.text: Received my new spa cover a few weeks ago and it's the best cover I've ever had for my spa in over 15 years!. It's of better quality, lighter and nicer looking than any of the ones I've purchased from the spa manufacturer. The customer service from the initial designing through to the delivery was outstanding and very personal. Customer service quickly replied to any questions that I had and was also quick to contact me to let me know I had omitted some information on my initial order. Delivery was quick and professional and I would recommend this company to anyone ready to invest in a quality cover for their spa.
customer_reviews.author: emily a hurst

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: It came when it was supposed to. It fit properly. It's way lighter than my old water logged one. Only problem I had is that because it's thicker it doesn't fit between the tub and deck rail like the old one did. I was able to turn the lift assist so it comes off on the other side. Not a huge problem. I'll give it 5 stars for now but the only hesitation I have is that the vinal doesn't seem as thick as original issue cover. Time will tell. Overall I'm pretty pleased. Seems a good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Honl

customer_reviews.title: We love our spa!!
customer_reviews.text: Every step of the scary measuring and ordering process was reassuring. They were in touch during the entire manufacturing, from are you sure emails to it's in the shop to it's been shipped. It arrived on time. My husband wanted the 6" thick, we live in Florida??? and I thought it would be a monstrosity, but it is not. It is well madeand the lighter blue color is much richer than the color chart. I would reccommend this company to anyone. They took anxiety out of the decisions and were very customer friendly.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company!
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, excellent customer service. Would purchase again. Spent approximately $600 for mine with all the upgrades (triple bagging of the foam to prevent water logging, extra thickness in center, extra insulation baffling for the center seam), but I feel it will be worth it. I’ll update my review in the future if necessary... but excellent overall review.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: oversized spa needed a cover
customer_reviews.text: the web site for selecting and designing the cover was terrific; the customer communications about the process of making our cover and shipping it to us was flawless; the cover itself is very well made and is precisely what we asked for; the price and timeline was perfectly acceptable. i wish more online businesses would operate the way BeyondNice operates. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria and/or Paul Vixie

customer_reviews.title: It really IS  Beyond Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover and a great price! Customer service was awesome! They helped me on the corner measurement and we got it perfect! It was shipped right on time and the company emailed me instructions on accepting or rejecting the cover when it was delivered. It is made in the USA and of heavy duty, quality material. I would buy it again in a heartbeat. Thank you Beyind Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The folks at Beyond Nice..ARE BEYOND NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a cover for my aging Nordic hot tub online thru Beyond Nice this spring. I can not tell you how pleased I am. They made everything easy and provided fantastic service and a quality product. I am impressed and I don't often say that. Every part of the process was seamless..even the delivery was great! I highly recommend these fine folks. Thank you Beyond Nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L Sutton-charron

customer_reviews.title: We are glad we did
customer_reviews.text: The original cover was thin and flimsy - didn't survive two winters. We received a few quotes for a replacement cover, but the price and especially the shipping fee made it hard to commit. Found BeyondNice on amazon, saw the price (1/2 of earlier quotes) and free shipping and took a chance. We are glad we did! The cover is excellent! Well made, and exactly as described. Shipping took longer than expected, but it arrived in one piece. I would and have recommended BeyondNice to others!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not terrible
customer_reviews.text: Cover is well made, although they missed stitching on 2 of the buckles. Shipping was a big hassle. There was a lot of communication but it was unclear and useless - just the same automated message over and over again despite repeated conversations. Size was correct as ordered.
customer_reviews.author: mwavs

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy
customer_reviews.text: We are very, very glad with our purchase. The online help to measure for the cover was exact and very helpful. The emails regarding our purchase and the progress of the manufacturing reassured us that we would receive a quality product and we are not disappointed. It is very nice and exactly what we expected and needed. Highly recommend this company for reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Fits.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new Spa Cover from Beyond Nice. It is very nice. First time I have ordered from this company. They communicate well, sending emails periodically about manufacturing and shipping status. The cover was made at a wholesale cover manufacturer in Florida, which required 10 days to make, then 7 days for shipping to Colorado. Cover is within 1/2 inch of specifications and fits well. No problem with shipping, arrived in good shape. Cover may well last as long as the previous one. If it does, I will order from Beyond Nice again.
customer_reviews.author: Oakwind

customer_reviews.title: Great product - but takes a LONG time to receive
customer_reviews.text: Great cover - great quality. Only complaint is shipping/time it took to get. BeyondNice estimates 10-15 business days, and mine took over a month to receive. They also send an annoying email every day to let you know that your hot tub cover is still not at your house (well duh). I would order from these guys again, just as long as I had plenty of time to wait for it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Better product, MUCH better value than any competitor spa cover
customer_reviews.text: Dollar for Dollar they have the best product on the market. I did plenty of research and shopping around and this cover is worth every penny. No competitors even come close. And, no, I do not work for BeyondNice nor did they ask me to write this review. The cover is reasonably priced, well made, fits perfectly and is very energy efficient. I will definitely be recommending this company to anyone who owns a hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Nice stayed in close email contact during the whole process
customer_reviews.text: The purchase, shipping and delivery all went very well. Beyond Nice stayed in close email contact during the whole process. It is a quality product that will save us money over time because of the much better insulation. Measuring was clear from their site and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stan and Chris Schierman

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with my new cover!
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best and easiest online purchases I've ever made! Starting with a website that is incredibly informative that made me so much more comfortable measuring my tub which is important when it comes to non-cancelable/non-returnable items. Ordering process was seamless and then I was kept informed via email through every step of the covers manufacturing and shipping progress! It arrived on time within the promised window date AND it fits absolutely perfectly! If you're looking to replace your hot tub cover I highly recommend you order your next one from BeyondNice!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our new cover. We had it made custom and took the measurements ourselves. The cover fits absolutely perfect! We are so pleased. It was nice that we received an email everyday saying that it was in production. It didn't take them long at all to make and we are completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: louis

customer_reviews.title: The workmanship looks great, and the extra insulation really makes a big ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover about a month, and so far it has exceeded my expectations. I took a lot of time measuring the spa and this is really key to getting a cover that fits perfectly. The workmanship looks great, and the extra insulation really makes a big difference. The cover has a five year warranty, and it will be interesting to see how well it holds out; my previous covers haven't lasted more than three years. So far, this cover seems superior to others I have owned, and I am very happy with the value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Reade

customer_reviews.title: Good Experience!
customer_reviews.text: The product took about 3 weeks to arrive via freight/truck delivery. The cover fits well, looks like the example and had all the features requested. It's nicely made with what appears to be quality materials. I've had it on my fart tub for about one month now and so far I'm completely satisfied with my purchase. Highly recommended seller.
customer_reviews.author: TRex

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Goes above and beyond our expectations!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this with little trepidation after reading the positive reviews. It fits better than the one that came with it from the manufacturer. My husband liked that we could really customize the details and the length of the skirt, and the insulation lever\l. 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Ploosha the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: We spent a while researching where to buy a new spa cover, from stores nearby to places online, and finally settled on Hot Tub Cover Depot. They were able to answer some important questions we had which set our minds at ease and when the cover arrived it was a perfect fit. Better than our previous one for sure, and it seems to be made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Meisner

customer_reviews.title: This Hot Tub Cover is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely satisfied. The hot tub cover is beautiful and extremely well-built. It was delivered on time and exactly matching my submitted specifications. It is already saving me money: when I left the hot tub in "energy saver" mode with the other cover the hot tub would stay at 95 degrees. With the new cover is is staying 102 degrees while using the same amount of energy. This product is highly recommended. Note that I ordered the 5 mil water barrier and the continous hinge seal - it seemed like a worthwhile investment for a cover that I expect to last 5-8 years.
customer_reviews.author: IconTom

customer_reviews.title: HONESTY IN ADVERTIZING
customer_reviews.text: The hot tub cover we ordered using the excellent on-line tools was exactly as we ordered it. Thecompany was honest about the product, and about possible delays due to seasonal volume. The shipping company deliveryman was courteous, and helped me inspect the cover before I signed for it (a very good idea). There wasn't any damage to the carton or the cover, although i was surprised to find that there wasn't any protection of the cover other than the shipping box itself. I wouldn't hesitate to order from this company again, and give them my highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Tweedy

customer_reviews.title: More cover for your money
customer_reviews.text: A super good deal om my new spa cover.I called the manufacturer of my spa on a new cover,there price was at least $ 60.00 dollars more and it was for a standard little 3 in thickness cover.My new cover which is 6in. thick and it fits a whole lot better than the one that came with the spa..I will definately recommend to all to order from Beyond nice when in need of a new cover. They kept you informed on the process each day ,which I really liked.I'm totally pleased, Ken Charleston SC
customer_reviews.author: kpresnell

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover, Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After a huge search to get my new cover I looked at some of these reviews at amazon, and settled on this company, They did not let me down, measurement was a breeze and the finished product was a perfect fit. I had an issue with the trucking company arranging for the delivery, but the folks at Beyond Nice, were just that,they took the steps to solve the issue that the shipper had and get the cover delivered. I bought the cover lifter from them too and that worked out just great. This is my 4th cover and I think I finally found a company that I will do business with again!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Van Ness

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: The website was very helpful during the ordering process - lots of great pictures to help clarify terms and make sure we were giving coherent measurements. The cover arrived in the time period predicted in perfect condition. We are very pleased with the cover and definitely recommend BeyondNice for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy YH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the spa cover from Amazon through direct retailer, Beyond Nice. THIS COVER FIT LIKE A GLOVE!!!!! We couldn't be happier! The quality is simply outstanding. Not much else to say. Ordering took most of the time since there were measurements involved. The good thing is that the cover measurements are stored and all I have to do is select a color. The cover was subbed from Prestige Spa Covers. Well done and thank you for your time and for what you do...
customer_reviews.author: Fred & Kris

customer_reviews.title: So far, a winner
customer_reviews.text: We purchased Beyondnices hot tub cover after inheriting a used hot tub. They were very competitive in price and features and it was easy to order. The quality seems good. Going into a new expense, we were concerned about keeping our costs low and are hoping that this cover will do the trick. We'll let you know once our cold Michigan weather hits.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Feight

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover as a present for my brother. I researched covers online for hours and settled on BeyondNice based on customer reviews and quality of their product. The ordering process was simple and the contact with their customer service was outstanding. The cover was delivered earlier than expected and it arrived in perfect condition. The quality of the new cover put the old one to shame! I am very happy with the new cover and the entire ordering process! My brother is thrilled with the cover and said his tub looks like new again! I'm sure he will see a reduction in his utility bill with the the new,thicker cover.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Sutor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great service
customer_reviews.text: This company kept us informed of the progress in building our spa cover in regular emails which was thoughtful since the delivery time was to be around three weeks. It was completed in two weeks and delivery was seamless with the spa company organizing an alternate delivery time to suit our needs. The cover is heavy duty, snug and well made. We have only had it for a month so it's early days, but since it is guaranteed for 5 years we don't have to worry that it won't make it :) will definitely use BeyondNice again ... in 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Emmnmuz

customer_reviews.title: Greal all around - quality, service, price.
customer_reviews.text: When time came to replace my hot tub cover, I looked around for a better option than the local hot tub dealer. I found BeyondNice and loved the options to customize the cover. I ended up with a cover with far better specs than the hot tub dealer, at a much lower price. Ordered it, and it arrived in just a couple of weeks - custom manufactured. Awesome cover. Much better than the one it replaced. Will be back next time I need a new cover! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Perry Platypus

customer_reviews.title: I settled on BehondNice because their website was the easiest to use and provided the most useful information about the features
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience ordering a replacement cover for my hot tub. I was surprised by the cost when I began looking, so I did quite a bit of searching. I settled on BehondNice because their website was the easiest to use and provided the most useful information about the features and what you get with them. The whole process went very smoothly, from ordering to shipping, BeyondNice was very good about setting my expectations along the way. The cover seems to be of good quality. It fits perfectly, and I was a little worried about that when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: John Slone

customer_reviews.title: Cover arrived quickly and looks good. Price seems to be in line with other ...
customer_reviews.text: Cover arrived quickly and looks good. Price seems to be in line with other companies from the research I have done. I've only had it a week or so and it is working out so far. I will repost as time goes on. One thing I had to do was get the screws for the new strap hardware. The new latches came with the cover as expected but no screws to mount them with.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover and great buying experience
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover and great buying experience! I called Beyond Nice because I was unsure exactly what I needed and was treated very well. Time was taken to explain the details of my order and determine what was needed. I was even encouraged to save money by downgrading on things that I did not need, like an extra thick cover. The product is wonderful and the service was... well, Beyond Nice! I would definitely recommend to friends and order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cover
customer_reviews.text: After looking all over the web, I selected this cover based the reviews and product description. The cover is very good quality, has solid construction, and even with some upgrades the cover is easily lifted. Was shipped promptly and seller provided good status updates. Only time will tell how long it will last, but my initial impressions are very good.
customer_reviews.author: jsbig

customer_reviews.title: Great options - I got just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cover! Beyond Nice had loads of options to add just what my spa needed for cold NE winters on the deck. I didn't see many of the options that were offered at Beyond Nice offered elsewhere when I shopped around before buying, including insolation running the full-length under the fold area and double stitching where my cover lift pulls up the cover - nice! I got the extra thick cover with the hopes that my energy savings will help pay for the cover over time. Nice product and nice people!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the Lake

customer_reviews.title: Best cover we have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd cover, and the best quality by far. The ordering process was very easy, and we especially liked the option to order a custom cover. The measuring instructions were easy to follow, and the result was a perfect fit. Our cover arrived in excellent condition within 10 days. We chose Beyond Nice due to consumer reviews, price, color selection, and ease of ordering process. We will most definitely order from this company again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Superior product, built to order. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy the manufacturer's cover again - will always buy from Beyond Nice. Process was easy and the product is exceptional. I finally have a spa cover that fits my hot tub....because the order page allowed me to enter my precise measurements and the cover was manufactured to my precise needs. Very, very impressed. Do not hesitate to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Shell

customer_reviews.title: Cover arrived in good shape on time and appears to be as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Cover arrived in good shape on time and appears to be as advertised. It seems to be well made. It is a 3rd cover but is brand new so too early to discuss how it is built or whether it will hold up over time. It fits well. I ordered extra internal manufacturing and hope it makes the cover last longer without getting water logged. I found the manufacturer to be very helpful on the phone and the website was easy to use to insure proper measurements and available options. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience working with BeyondNice
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd cover for the Hot Tub, and I must say - the price, the quality of the product, the customer experience was definitely the best by far in comparison to all previous ones. It was easy to do the customizations, and then I have been notified along the way on the progress of the cover creation. It works perfectly, and I hope it also lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent process and product!
customer_reviews.text: Although we were very worried about ordering a new hot tub cover on-line we found the instructions for measuring to be very easy to follow. The cover was delivered within the time frame given and perfectly fit our hot tub. We especially appreciated the frequent communication from Beyond Nice keeping us up to date on the manufacture and shipping process. I would without hesitation purchase another cover from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Bezek

customer_reviews.title: Hot Tub Cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover was as advertised and exceeded expectations. Fits perfectly and looks great. Communication from the company was helpful and timely. Only complaint was they were too cumbersome in making sure they got the order right. Better this way than shipping the wrong product I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holder

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY PERFECT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My spa cover is magneficent. The fit is awesome, it's not nearly as heavy as the old cover, and the craftsmanship is top notch. I highly recommend this seller. Just remember........measure once, measure twice, measure three times before submitting your order. Our cover fits absolutely PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.I.A.

customer_reviews.title: ... shocked at the difference in quality of the Beyond Nice hot tub cover and the one I was presently ...
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at the difference in quality of the Beyond Nice hot tub cover and the one I was presently using. It not only showed up on time, the shipping was excellent, and the cover fit perfectly. I love the thickness and quality of the product and know my electric bills will be much lover this winter thanks to Beyond Nice. i usually don't get excited about something as mundane as a hot tub cover but this being my third cover, it's definitely well above the other two that previously covered the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Presutti

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant ordering a cover site unseen. Needless to say totally satisfied. No problems with the shipping. Product is great. We should have ordered a new cover last year. V
customer_reviews.author: Marc H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Was initially skeptical of the non-standard ordering process, and whether or not it would fit as well as the previous cover, but the new cover fits perfectly, and was delivered on the promised date. Very happy with thickness, style, and lightness of the new cover.
customer_reviews.author: Miles J Price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Can not stress how happy we are with this cover. This is a quality cover at a reasonable price. The product was shipped via Estes and the driver was very courteous. The driver helped us remove the packaging and inspect the cover, he then offered to get rid of the packaging for us. I highly recommend this company for hot tub covers and would use them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Snydera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover because it was much cheaper than the one from my spa retailer. This is the first time I have ordered a spa cover online. Some of the options that I chose seemed to be a bit confusing to the Beyond Nice team. Not because it is difficult, I just wasn't sure. They contacted me right away to be sure that I was getting what I expected. They were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: NCP

customer_reviews.title: Love the cover hate the shipping
customer_reviews.text: Cover is great. Love how they email you with updates. Shipping was terrible. After a week of going around and around with UPS about times, dates etc they finally are coming between one and four. They call and tell us they are a half mile away and can't get to our street. We live in a suburban area and have had plenty of deliveries. Our choice is come get it or no cover. Fortunately we are not handicapped or we would have never received our cover. Would not order again unless I could be assured of to my door delivery.
customer_reviews.author: E Permaloff

customer_reviews.title: Our New cover from BeyondNice is great!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had the cover for a month but so far it is everything we had hoped it would be when we ordered it from BeyondNice. We got a 6in to 4in with upgraded filler, double wrapped interior foam and a full length (interior) seam protector. The wet-spots on the deck from our prior covers at the seam are now gone! Shipping was as expected (time it took to get here). In 5 years when this one get's to heavy to deal with I will certainly call BeyondNice again!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good company to do business with.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered couple months ago and have had in place the last couple of weeks. Beyond Nice did a great job of keeping me informed of the progress of building the cover and when it would be delivered. It fit my specifications without error. It looks nice. I am pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received it and looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, cover is very light and we have had a lot of snow not quite as bad as the picture. Color and dimensions were riight on. Cover looks good and can't beat the free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Veteran Bill USMC

customer_reviews.title: Superior product.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, delivered on time. It appears to very well made, much better than other replacement covers and superior to the one supplied by the SPA manufacturer. I ordered the thick cover to conserve the loss of heat cutting down on heating cost.
customer_reviews.author: Don Cappell

customer_reviews.title: My new cover has worked out great. I have seen a reduction in my electrical ...
customer_reviews.text: My new cover has worked out great. I have seen a reduction in my electrical bill since replacing my old 4" cover. Also my old cover did not have a slope to it which caused it to cave in. New cover does not get water pooling on top either. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: John Beaumaster

customer_reviews.title: This is used on my spa in Michigan
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this cover for a few weeks so I guess a true review might take a year or so. But the cover is very nice and fit perfect. The whole process was a lot faster than I thought it would be. I cant believe how lite it is, WOW! so make sure to use tie downs outside. Great job and its nice to still see something made in the good old USA.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Nice Spa cover
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a spa cover from Beyond Nice Spa Covers. It arrived in the time frame that was promised. It meet all of the specifications that I had supplied to Beyond Nice. Beyond Nice sent a daily email letting me know what the progress of the manufacture of my spa cover was. They were extremely customer friendly, and went above what I had expected or received from the other spa cover manufacturers that I have dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ethington

customer_reviews.title: new hot tub cover
customer_reviews.text: The hot tub is much nicer than the original. The shippping time was much shorter than expected or would have been through my local store. The price was cheaper as well. The only regret is not getting the stonger tie downs(optional). The cover is very well built and much thicker than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: It's a good cover, although one corner sits about 1 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: Found this on Amazon, ordered through the external BeyondNice website. The cover is made by a 3rd party company called Spa Covers Inc. in Hollywood, FL. It's a good cover, although one corner sits about 1 inch above the tub as if it's a tad warped. Not sure whether the other reviews are legit but this one is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hot tub cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit perfectly! 100 times better constructed than the one that came with the tub. Customer service wonderful and answered all my questions. Shipping right on time. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dealyne

customer_reviews.title: Just received my new cover and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased my hot tub new the original cover never really fit properly. You need to convince prospective customers that your process for ordering a custom cover really works best. I did not understand why I couldn't simply tell you the make and model of my Hot Tub and expect it to fit. I now understand what you mean when you say in your web site that you build it to the exact dimensions that the customer orders. Thanks for a quality product! Maury F. (Michigan)
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME company and GREAT cover!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about dealing with this company. Emails came often up-dating the status and even received a letter in the MAIL thanking me for buying from them. The cover itself fits perfectly and is of good quality. The price is right on since the last one I bought was 10 years ago and from a local place - i paid $15.00 more for this one and it's a better cover. I did my homework before I purchased this and I made the right choice buying from them. Just an all-around good company to deal with!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: luann larkin

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This cover really lives up to it's descriptions. It fits perfectly, was delivered earlier than we expected, and seems to be a quality product through and through. We couldn't be more pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lett

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover arrived, I examined it closely for damage (there was none), and I took it to the hot-tub, and it fits perfectly. I have no problem with it or the experience. I do recommend to anyone that gets it to inspect it carefully before you sign for it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great hot tub cover. Very high quality. Looking forward to enjoying it for many years. I was surprised they didn't use UPS to ship. Some off the wall company that I had to do some coordination with which delayed delivery a bit but all good.
customer_reviews.author: mlfinch

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: We had our cover delivered in less than 4 weeks. The fit was so good I have not had to brave the cold and snow to install the tie down anchors, yet the cover barely moves in the high winds. We went with the longest skirt length available without additional charge, which seems to make the difference in keeping the cover down on the spa. The 5-year warranty is a nice feature, but we're hoping we don't have to use it. So far, we're thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: askfed

customer_reviews.title: Spa Cover
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product (quality A+, material A+, and build A+). Company was extremely responsive and was "Johnny-on-the-spot" with all questions and concerns. Best value in my opinion if you're in the market for spa covers.
customer_reviews.author: Labowski (Dude)

customer_reviews.title: I found it easy to understand how to order our replacement cover
customer_reviews.text: I found it easy to understand how to order our replacement cover. Throughout the whole process, customer service and updates were superior. Our new cover arrived quickly and safely. It fits perfectly. We can't believe how light it is. Wonderful all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great servbice create cover
customer_reviews.text: We received shippent faster than they said. The cover is exactly to our specifications. It keep hot tub real warm. Water rolls off the slated top which was an issue for use before with the flat hot tub covers. I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and finish, good looking cover
customer_reviews.text: My old cover was so waterlogged it was difficult to open. The difference is night and day with this new cover. It is so easy to open and close I want to use my hot tub more often. BeyondNice was great to work with and the cover came fast. Recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Ott

customer_reviews.title: The cover is nice.....but the shipping not so much
customer_reviews.text: Cover was as described very nice....but took 16 days from Florida to Michigan, over all very satisfied with the product Brian
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality of my new cover
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of my new cover. In addition, customer service was very responsive and helpful in guiding me through the purchase process.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S

customer_reviews.title: perfect experience
customer_reviews.text: very easy to measure and order, arrived in perfect shape. totally happy with the transaction. I ordered the extra 2" of insulation, glad I did. for what little it cost, I would recommend that option without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: After buying a used hot tub with a used cover that was already splitting, I knew I would need to replace the cover. I love the selection and security when shopping on Amazon.com and this is the only place I shopped. This cover meets my needs and the ordering process was easy and streamlined (very easy instructions for needed measurements). The shipping company called to set up a delivery appt and arrived on time. I would use this company again. The cover looks to be constructed well and fits perfectly. Thanks! Cindy
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made
customer_reviews.text: This cover is beautifully made. It's a new company for me & so far, so good. Winter will really tell the tale, but I am optimistic. Excellent company to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: My old spa cover was damaged by a hail storm in late summer. I shopped for a replacement both locally and on the internet. The local market offered covers that were not locally made but were manufactured somewhere else. They also seemed to be priced a bit higher than what was offered on line. I was able to purchase a better insulator and higher quality cover from "Beyond Nice" than I would have found locally at an equal price. The quality of their workmanship is first class. They also lived up to their promises on delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Doug

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size made for our cover
customer_reviews.text: Upon delivery of the cover we immediately noticed the clips that we measured and remeasured and sent countless photographs of with rulers were wrongly made. Then we installed the cover and the back/rear of the hot tub was not the right radius so the skirt did not fit. It has been 2 weeks and countless emails back and forth. Me taking more pictures and providing Jacuzzi diagrams them trying to figure out what went wrong. Bottom line we still do not have a cover that fits and no resolution in sight.
customer_reviews.author: I.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting
customer_reviews.text: I can't say we are satisfied because our cover does not fit despite our measurements being correct. We ordered on November 8th and we have yet to find out if they will replace it because of the mistake they made. We have sent several pictures of our measurements of old cover and cover they sent us that don't match our original order.......still waiting.
customer_reviews.author: mrieman

customer_reviews.title: Great customer phone support, love my cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great cover! Super helpful on the phone. Helped with color and size. Shipping was on time and even carried it back to the back yard and in perfect condition. Very happy with the quality and it is not super heavy like our cover was before. Would definitely order next cover again from them😄
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was great, love the cover
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great , love the cover, looks like it's a lot thicker than my old one. Perfect fit and very happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: BeyondNice Ultra Hot Tub Cover, Custom Made 6" Thick Maximum Insulating Replacement Spa Cover - World's Only Design Your Own Ordering Wizard Insures Every Cover is Made Perfectly for Every Customer!
feature_bullets: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ OUR AMAZON STORE REVIEWS ARE 100% POSITIVE (year ending 9-9-19) 😃 Have complete confidence when buying from us! These unmatched reviews prove our cover quality and service are #1. We have 98% positive lifetime reviews! Our deluxe custom made cover has 4.8 stars with 90 reviews and NO 1 or 2 stars.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ VERIFIED REVIEWS RATE US #1 BEST COVER 🏆 Buy our worry free thermal insulating cover with a 5 year warranty. Verified reviews from consumers that have received our durable covers, not post checkout reviews, prove our hot tub covers are rated #1. Be suspicious when sellers brag about quantity, not quality.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ DESIGN-YOUR-OWN Ordering 🧙 We end your worry about getting the right spa cover for your specific needs. Only with BeyondNice is every replacement cover made perfectly for every buyer! Protect your hot tub and reduce your heating bill with our replacement hot tub covers and spa covers for Jacuzzis.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ MADE IN THE USA 🗽 Only buy from sellers that clearly state who manufactures their covers. BeyondNice brand top quality covers are manufactured in the USA by Spa Cover Incorporated – making covers for 34 years and counting! Some claim USA made when they are actually made in Mexico and ONLY assembled in the USA
